name: Radiance (OverPowered Team)
description:
Radiance is a game based on a frantic experience of survival.

The player controls the Radiance, wich is ascending through the grid, dodging geometric obstacles. While ascending, the Radiance gets smaller, in order to survive, the player will have to absorb smaller Rads.

To duck the objects and get points, the player will have to press the screen to create a stream of particles that will push the Radiance. Besides the obstacles and the Rads, the player will encounter stars, which will increase the score.
